Write-Up Text: It seems like people Down Under are having mixed emotions about the government's upcoming federal budget. Some are wary about the budget's focus on handouts to the elderly while younger folks on income support are left struggling to make ends meet. Meanwhile social media feedback that news of major infrastructure projects like Snowy Hydro is getting delayed and going over-budget has left people feeling dubious. The mention of funding for a new natural disaster messaging system in the budget raises hope for better communication and coordination during disasters but the efficacy of such systems has not gone unchallenged on social media.
